response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our unique and highly valuable product to you. This product holds immense significance and potential for growth, which we believe aligns perfectly with your business objectives. Given its intrinsic value and the benefits it offers, we are extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $950,000. We understand its worth to you might be $800,000, but we hope this offer will facilitate a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
